content: Suppose a company with a revenue growth rate of 10% per year, a profit margin of 15%, and a debt-to-equity ratio of 0.5. They are considering investing in a new product line that requires an initial investment of $10 million but is expected to generate $5 million in revenue per year for the next five years. The cost of capital for the company is 10%. Using PHP code, how would you calculate the net present value (NPV) of the investment and determine if the company should invest in the new product line?
